I entered economics for the same reason, I dont suck at it but God I feel like Im going to rot in my office if I keep up with it so I decided to follow my other passion in life, (aside from making cartoons, writing and time travel) History, since I heard its pretty well paid in England.

topics.body:
"@Meresflut":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53c8afbf6368722cbecd0200#post_53c8afbf6368722cbecd0200
I normally deal with kids in third or fourth grade. And they like me well enough. The thing about kids is, a lot of people like to talk down to them. You can't do that. You have to treat them like people. When a child asks you a question, you should give an honest answer even if makes you uncomfortable.
